properties.entry: SELECT HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_WRITER , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_TEXT , HOTEL_SIZE , MEMBER_ID , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "TITLEIMG" FROM HOTEL H JOIN MEMBER M ON (HOTEL_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) JOIN IMAGE ON (HOTEL_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE HOTEL_STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND IMAGE_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY HOTEL_NO DESC

SELECT HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_WRITER , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_TEXT , HOTEL_SIZE , D_NUMBER , HOTEL_START , HOTEL_END , RESERVATION_PRICE , MEMBER_ID FROM HOTEL H JOIN RESERVATION R ON (HOTEL_NO = PROGRAM_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (H.HOTEL_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE HOTEL_NO = ? AND HOTEL_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO , REF_BNO , FILE_NAME , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "TITLEIMG" FROM IMAGE WHERE IMAGE_TYPE = 2 AND REF_BNO = ?
INSERT INTO HOTEL ( HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_WRITER , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_TEXT , HOTEL_SIZE , D_NUMBER , HOTEL_START , HOTEL_END ) VALUES ( SEQ_HOTEL.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO IMAGE ( FILE_NO , REF_BNO , IMAGE_TYPE , FILE_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_IMAGE.NEXTVAL , SEQ_HOTEL.CURRVAL , 2 , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( RESERVATION_NO , PROGRAM_NO , FACILITY_NO , RESERVATION_PRICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_RESERVATION.NEXTVAL , SEQ_HOTEL.CURRVAL , 2 , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) HCOUNT FROM RESERVATION WHERE FACILITY_NO = 2 AND PROGRAM_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO != 0 AND RESERVATION_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE HOTEL SET HOTEL_STATUS = 'N' WHERE HOTEL_NO = ?

SELECT CLASS_NO , CLASS_WRITER , CLASS_NAME , CLASS_TEXT , CLASS_SIZE , MEMBER_ID , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "TITLEIMG" FROM CLASS C JOIN MEMBER M ON (CLASS_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) JOIN IMAGE ON (CLASS_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE CLASS_STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND IMAGE_TYPE = 4 ORDER BY CLASS_NO DESC

SELECT CLASS_NO , CLASS_WRITER , CLASS_NAME , CLASS_TEXT , CLASS_SIZE , D_NUMBER , RESERVATION_START , RESERVATION_END , RESERVATION_PRICE , MEMBER_ID FROM CLASS C JOIN RESERVATION R ON (CLASS_NO = PROGRAM_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (C.CLASS_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = ? AND CLASS_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) CCOUNT FROM RESERVATION WHERE FACILITY_NO = 4 AND PROGRAM_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO != 0 AND RESERVATION_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO , REF_BNO , FILE_NAME , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "TITLEIMG" FROM IMAGE WHERE IMAGE_TYPE = 4 AND REF_BNO = ?
UPDATE CLASS SET CLASS_STATUS = 'N' WHERE CLASS_NO = ?
INSERT INTO CLASS ( CLASS_NO , CLASS_WRITER , CLASS_NAME , CLASS_TEXT , CLASS_SIZE , D_NUMBER ) VALUES ( SEQ_CLASS.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO IMAGE ( FILE_NO , REF_BNO , IMAGE_TYPE , FILE_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_IMAGE.NEXTVAL , SEQ_CLASS.CURRVAL , 4 , ? , ? , ? , ? )
